participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and creative, Emily has a nurturing spirit and a love for storytelling.
participant_1.background: I bought a book for myself and my cats to read together. My eye contact issues can get in the way of my work, but I'm trying my best to overcome them. My favorite food is jello. Since young I have loved fashion. I used to play softball until my health prevented me from doing so.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Friendly and practical, Jake enjoys cooking and has a down-to-earth attitude towards life.
participant_2.background: I treat myself to something I've been wanting. I live in the countryside, where there's plenty of space for my black lab to run around. I went to an all girls christian high school. I try to watch what I eat. I work as a grill cook.

content.text: Hey! I'm doing well, how about you?
I'm doing great! I just bought a new book for myself and my cats to read together.
That sounds so cute! What kind of book is it?
It's a children's book about a cat who goes on an adventure.
That sounds adorable! I love cats. I have a black lab named Charlie who I love to take on walks in the countryside.
That sounds nice. I used to play softball, but my health prevented me from doing so.
I'm sorry to hear that. I hope you're doing better now.
Thank you! I am doing much better.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to cook, go to the movies, and spend time with my family.
Those sound like fun things to do. I love to cook too. Do you have any favorite recipes?
I love making homemade pasta. I also love making desserts.
That sounds delicious! I love making desserts too.
We should have a cooking competition sometime!
That would be fun! I'd love to
